Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
Summary: 15to 25 discs droped, formed V formation. avoided jet plane. Sped to dark rain Cloud.
divs: sighting detailsmy brother and i (both air force vets) heard a jet plane passing over going from south to north. it was partly cloudy. we did not see the jet but saw 15 to 25 free falling (no power), dull aluminum collored disk shaped ufos. after getting below the clouds they formed a v formation.they moved to the south and turned to the east. they flickered like they did not have full control. they accelleratd to a high rate of speed toward a dark rain cloud which was over our mobil oil refinery. several times one of them would shoot streight up or down 100 plus feet and the return to it's place in the 400+ m\hr v formation. we lost sight as they went to the dark cloud. they avoided the jet fighter. they were noisless. we saw a newspaper report that ufos had been seen in 5 different countries the same week. we made no report because we knew that the blue book crew would be no help.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Beaumont
There were no other sightings in Beaumont on or around September 11th 1954
